description:
Keroro`s insulted that Natsumi likes dogs better than frogs, so he turns her into a dog to teach her a lesson.  Then he tries to get embarrassing photos of her with Saburo-senpai!  And then the Keroro Platoon decides to build an aquarium, and captures an unexpected surprise.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsumi - Nacchi, the Good Dog / Keroro - A Keropper`s Naughtiness
夏美 名犬ナッチー であります / ケロロ わんぱくケロッパー であります
